vacation_message: Hello! Fox City Vintage will be on vacation until September 15, 2013. See you soon!
sale_message:
I'm so glad you found something to enjoy from my shop.
Thank you!
policy_payment:
I accept credit card payments directly through Etsy. 

All payments are due at the time of purchase.
policy_shipping:
PLEASE ASK ABOUT RUSH SHIPPING BEFORE PURCHASING THE ITEM.

All items are shipped from San Francisco, California.

All items are shipped out via USPS on Mondays and Thursdays.

I am not responsible for items lost in the mail. I will provide a confirmation/tracking number for domestic packages.

Send a message to inquire about international shipping. 

I ship internationally with First Class Mail, which does not come with a tracking number and takes 3-6 weeks.
policy_refunds:
Vintage means that the items have been pre-owned. Normal wear is expected when an item has travelled through time for 20 years or more. I am specific when describing flaws that are above average. 

No refunds are offered. Please feel free to contact me with ANY questions concerning an item's condition or measurements before purchasing. 

I am not responsible for items lost in the mail. A confirmation/tracking number will be provided.
policy_additional:
Sizing:
I include the tag size (if any) in addition to measurements taken while lying flat. It is always a good idea to compare one of your favorite flattering pieces to the measurements listed. I'm happy to provide any additional information you may need.
vacation_autoreply:
Hello,

Fox City Vintage will be in vacation mode until September 15, 2013. I will be happy to answer your message when I return.

Thanks,

Jenelle
